title: Reconnection Error
body: I know there has been issues with the new client where you have to press cancel and then reconnect to get in game after champ select, but now when i try and do that it does the same thing. I tried restarting my computer and ive even reinstalled LoL and nothing is working. Is there a way I can fix this. Please help. I've scanned for corrupt files and everything.

replies.body: The firewall issue worked. Thank you very much.

It sounds like you're having a connection problem reaching the game servers, which is why you see a black screen because it can't download assets.  Reinstalling wouldn't help in this case, but the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should.  Go over that to fix the issue for good!
I just get a black screen when trying to load in game
